title: Captcha Code
body:
Hi,

I'm having issues cerating a new account the captcha code isn't appearing at all i'm a firefox use and chrome but it is not working on either has anyone encoutered the same issue? if you have and know how to fix it please let me know.

thank you

replies.body: That's a strange issue!  What happens if you reboot your pc then try running on Incognito, in case of any extensions that could be blocking it?  Let me know if that helps.
